QuestData.Title: Ride of the Wild Hunt
QuestData.Description:
Thanks to your efforts, we have turned the tide of battle. We won't soon forget your aid.
We should be able to hold Soryn's Meadow, now that this brute is dead.
Ride with us, $n. Let us return to the road and your wildseed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride with the Wild Hunt to Niya and the wildseed.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Ara'lon on the road to Hibernal Hollow.
QuestData.RewardText:
It is good to see part of the Wild Hunt's strength restored... and also that you found the spirit cradle of use.
Now let us bring the wildseed within it to Hibernal Hollow.
